resources.string: You can check elasticity of your lens
You can check your visual acuity with a short sight chart
You can check your visual acuity with a long sight chart
Children who do not know how to read can have a visual acuity test
You can check for macular degeneration
Use the Amsler chart to check if there are any abnormalities in the macular
Use the M-Chart to check if there are any abnormalities in the macular
"Eye examinations in the this application are self-examination and "
" so please visit a hospital and consult a doctor for an accurate diagnosis. Test results may vary depending on the condition of your eyes, surrounding environment, or device."
Presbyopia is an eye disease in which the elasticity of the crystalline lens decreases with age and the accommodative power is reduced.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.
If the macula, which is the focal point of the retinal nerve, is degenerated, the lattice pattern looks bent, blank, or black.
Refractive error occurs when the retina cannot focus accurately, and is corrected with glasses by distinguishing between nearsightedness and farsightedness.
Please proceed after confirming the test order
Touch the screen to start eye test
Cover your left eye\nand test your right eye
Cover your right eye\nand test your left eye
Please put your head in the center
If the measurement distance changes during the test, the value of the eye examination may change.
Which color do you see better?
Place the device parallel to your eyes and stop where the target is clearly visible.
Come closer slowly and stop where the target is started to blur.
Repeat the above steps for each image.
Check your eyes on a regularly to keep them healthy.
Measure the distance between your eyes and the camera by holding the phone up to your face.
Inspect the left and right eye separately.
Choose the correct answer for the chart that appears.
Measure the distance between your eyes and the camera by holding the phone up to your face.
Inspect the left and right eye separately.
Choose the correct answer for the chart that appears.
Measure the distance between your eyes and the camera by holding the phone up to your face.
Inspect the left and right eye separately.
Choose the correct answer for the chart that appears.
Place the screen parallel to the face and keep the distance between tthe eyes and the screen at 30cm
Press the part where the distortion occurs when you focus on the center.
Choose how that part looks.\n※ If there is no problem, move on without marking.
Maintain a 30cm distance between your eyes and the camera by holding the phone in front of you.
Please take a closer look at the lines on the screen.
If you seems bent, select the distorted line button.
If you seems straight, click the straight line button.
Come closer little by little from the 50cm point,\nstop at the point where the time table becomes blurry, and press the button
If there\'s nothing wrong with your eyes,\nyou\'ll get the same result as on the right
If there\'s nothing wrong with your eyes, you\'ll get the same result as on the bottom
Not all of the writings are clearly visible
Look at the black dot in the middle and choose the part that looks abnormal or distorted
Please choose from the bottom whether\nthe line below is straight or bent
